about_the_game:
Gameplay:



Elf World Adventure 4 is the continuation of an H-game in the anime and puzzle genres, immersing you in a captivating world inspired by samurai aesthetics. You'll enjoy many new levels where you collect images of beautiful elf girls dressed in exquisite outfits.

Dive into a magical atmosphere of Eastern culture accompanied by relaxing melodic music. This game will delight you not only with engaging and challenging puzzles but also with numerous achievements that will decorate your Steam profile and highlight your successes in the elf world!

Beautiful achievements:


Game Features:


  • Hentai Experience: Enjoy a game that combines puzzles with hentai elements.
  • Samurai Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a magical world of Eastern culture with elegant music.
  • Beautiful Elf Girls: Discover stunning images of elf girls in samurai-style attire.
  • Casual Gameplay: Simple controls and an accessible interface suitable for everyone.
  • Many Levels: Challenge yourself across numerous new levels.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not suitable for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or sexual content, general mature content. All characters are over 20 years old.

name: Elf World Adventure 4

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760 or Radeon HD 7850
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 or Radeon R9 380X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX

short_description: Elf World Adventure 4 is the continuation of an H-game in the anime and puzzle genres, immersing you in a captivating world inspired by samurai aesthetics. You'll enjoy many new levels where you collect images of beautiful elf girls dressed in exquisite outfits.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, Bulgarian, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Danish, Indonesian, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Polish, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Finnish, Swedish, Japanese
